name: slidedeck
description: Evidence-based presentation creation workflow using Slidev - from brainstorming to handout generation. Features research-backed design principles (90s/slide timing, cognitive load limits ≤6 elements, accessibility defaults, colorblind-safe palettes).

commands.name: brainstorm
commands.description: Interactive brainstorming and research phase for presentation creation

commands.name: create
commands.description: Create a complete presentation from brainstorming to handout generation

commands.name: diagram
commands.description: Create or improve mermaid diagram for specific slide

commands.name: edit-slide
commands.description: Edit a specific slide with table of contents context

commands.name: enhance-visuals
commands.description: Comprehensive visual enhancement for all slides

commands.name: export
commands.description: Export presentation to PDF, PPTX, or other formats

commands.name: handout
commands.description: Generate comprehensive LaTeX handout from presentation

commands.name: notes
commands.description: Generate or enhance presenter notes for all slides

commands.name: outline
commands.description: Create or revise presentation outline from brainstorming notes

commands.name: preview
commands.description: Start Slidev dev server to preview presentation

skills.name: Presentation Design
skills.description: Evidence-based presentation design principles, storytelling, visual hierarchy, and audience engagement strategies

skills.name: Slidev Mastery
skills.description: Comprehensive Slidev expertise for markdown-based presentations with layouts, animations, and accessibility features

skills.name: Visual Design
skills.description: Mermaid diagrams, colorblind-safe color palettes, stock photography, and AI image generation for presentations

skills.name: LaTeX Handouts
skills.description: Professional LaTeX document creation for presentation handouts with slides, notes, and supplementary materials

agents.name: outline-validator
agents.description: Validate presentation outline structure, flow, completeness, and time constraints using evidence-based timing (90s/slide default)

agents.name: slide-optimizer
agents.description: Review slide quality using 12-point evidence-based checklist (one idea, meaningful title, ≤6 elements, <50 words, accessibility)

agents.name: visual-suggester
agents.description: Suggest visual enhancements (mermaid diagrams, stock photos, AI images) for slides based on content analysis
